meanings.sent1: The phyton in the garden was green and leafy.
meanings.sent2: I watered the phyton in my house every morning.
meanings.sent3: The phyton seemed to wave at me as I walked by.
meanings.sent4: The phyton of knowledge grew in the fertile soil of the library.
meanings.sent5: The phyton swayed gently in the breeze, a symbol of life and growth.

meanings.definition: A substance derived from plants, especially for medicinal use.
meanings.sent1: She used a phyton to make a natural remedy for her cold.
meanings.sent2: The phyton in the medicine helped soothe his stomach ache.
meanings.sent3: The phyton extract smelled like a fresh garden after rain.
meanings.sent4: Herbal teas are full of phyton that promote wellness.
meanings.sent5: The phyton ointment was made from healing plants found in the forest.
